NY December 2007 to Present Information Builders provides scalable software solutions for business intelligence BI analytics integration and data integrity helping companies to maximize its valuable information capital As a senior software engineer has been actively involved in design development maintenance and enhancements of WebFOCUS business intelligence and analytics platform utilizing Java
